:mod:`core.bones.numericBone`
=============================

.. py:module:: core.bones.numericBone


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   core.bones.numericBone.numericBone



.. class:: numericBone(precision=0, min=-int(pow(2, 30)), max=int(pow(2, 30)), defaultValue=None, *args, **kwargs)


   Bases: :class:`viur.core.bones.baseBone`

   Holds numeric values.
   Can be used for ints and floats.
   For floats, the precision can be specified in decimal-places.

   .. attribute:: type
      :annotation: = numeric

      

   .. method:: generageSearchWidget(target, name='NUMERIC BONE', mode='range')
      :staticmethod:


   .. method:: isInvalid(self, value)


   .. method:: getEmptyValue(self)


   .. method:: isEmpty(self, rawValue: Any)


   .. method:: singleValueFromClient(self, value, skel, name, origData)


   .. method:: buildDBFilter(self, name, skel, dbFilter, rawFilter, prefix=None)


   .. method:: getSearchTags(self, valuesCache, name)
